Starter template Desk

  • Home
  • Article

Desk - starter template for the front-end on base PUG template and TailwindCSS frameworks

Starter uses NPM scripts in package.json, and PUG template for multi-page interface development. CSS is compiled using the TailwindCSS framework on base the PostCSS engine, using the nesting and import syntax, the Autoprefixer plugin and the CSSO plugin to minimize CSS. Rollup with plugins and Terser is used to compile and minimize JS. Imagemin plugin transform images with cleaning and minify.

Getting started

Install the node and the npm package manager, clone this repository in project folder and type this command into the wsl or mac terminal:

npm install

Default directory:

  • • For development source files: src
  • • For server and production: dist (will be created after run "dev" or "build")

Commands

1. Develop in browser

Run browser, watching files and live server reload.
You can open this in any browser: http://localhost:3000

npm run dev

2. Building files for production.

npm run build

3. Run server (if dir "dist" exist :) in browser.

npm run serve

Settings

Use package.json and config files for change settings.
